intro: Euphrasia azorica, commonly known as the Azorean eyebright, is a flowering plant native to the Azores. It belongs to the Orobanchaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers and hairy stems. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and rocky areas. It has lance-shaped leaves with a distinctive hairy texture. Euphrasia azorica is known for its medicinal properties and is often used in traditional herbal remedies.
